quest.name: Just Tooling Around
journal: There is much to see about Revenant's Toll, but Guiding Star only has eyes for you.

The sharp-eyed Guiding Star correctly determines that you are a person with skilled hands, and asks to see your tool of choice. While such a request would usually offend your sense of propriety, so earnest is he that you decide to speak with him again after equipping your gatherer's or crafter's primary tool (item level 50 and higher).

Guiding Star beheld your tool with all the decorum and delicacy called for by the occasion. Judging you to be both sufficiently adept and inadequately equipped, he introduces you to the toolsmith Talan. Deal with this surly smith and surely you will profit by it, in equipage and ability both.
objectives: Show your primary tool to Guiding Star.

dialogue.name: GUIDINGSTAR
dialogue.text: The name's Guiding Star, and you have the look of an [Job]a [Job]. My goal is no less than attaining complete mastery of all things crafting and gathering, and to this end I roam the world.

dialogue.name: GUIDINGSTAR
dialogue.text: But I must say that Revenant's Toll offers a sore temptation─the temptation to stay. I'd heard tell that the Adventurers' Guild had thrown its weight behind this place, but I'd no idea of the kind of talent pouring into the camp.

dialogue.name: GUIDINGSTAR
dialogue.text: I could tell just from your hands that you're an adept yourself. You've not flinched at the notion of a little hard work.

dialogue.name: GUIDINGSTAR
dialogue.text: One of your standing must have tools to match. Surely, you must own some choice items. Will you not let me see one?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Equip a gatherer's or crafter's primary tool (item level 50 and higher) and speak again with Guiding Star.

dialogue.name: GUIDINGSTAR
dialogue.text: One of your standing must have tools to match. Surely, you must own some choice items. Will you not let me see one?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Equip a gatherer's or crafter's primary tool (item level 50 and higher) and speak again with Guiding Star.

dialogue.name: GUIDINGSTAR
dialogue.text: Ah, magnificent. It is everything I expected...though not more.

dialogue.name: GUIDINGSTAR
dialogue.text: Forgive my blunt ways; no doubt you are fond of your chosen instrument. But surely there are tools better suited to you─tools that require the delicate touch of an adept of your stature.

dialogue.name: GUIDINGSTAR
dialogue.text: As it happens, such tools are available to you! You need go no further than Talan here. He can be a mite testy, but he's one of the finest toolsmiths the realm over, and his selection is impressive.

dialogue.name: GUIDINGSTAR
dialogue.text: Now, he won't simply hand them over. You might need to furnish the man with a bauble or three in exchange. But for an adventurer of your skill, such errands should pose little challenge.

dialogue.name: GUIDINGSTAR
dialogue.text: And if you would walk the lonely road to mastery, why not petition Talan for one of his tomes, too?

dialogue.name: GUIDINGSTAR
dialogue.text: He calls them “me cookbooks,” for they hold some of the most complex recipes you'll ever see. But you have skill enough for them, I'm sure.

dialogue.name: GUIDINGSTAR
dialogue.text: Ah, ever is a crafter ruled by a triumvirate: tool, skill, and curiosity. May you prosper in all three!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You may now trade with Talan. After obtaining specific items, you can exchange them for gatherer's and crafter's tools.
